scripts.build: rm -r build && mkdir -p build && cp -R app/static/* build && npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p build/js && NODE_ENV=production browserify -t babelify -t envify -e app/js/app.js | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -o build/js/app.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p build/styles && NODE_ENV=production lessc --plugin=less-plugin-autoprefix app/styles/app.less > build/styles/_app.css && csso build/styles/_app.css > build/styles/app.css && rm build/styles/_app.css
